xdi2.core
Interface Graph

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<Graph>, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGraph, KeyValueGraph, MemoryGraph
public interface Graph
extends Serializable, Comparable<Graph>

This interface represents a whole XDI graph. XDI graphs consist of context nodes, arcs, relations, and literals.

Author:
markus

compareTo
 

Method Detail

getRootContextNode

ContextNode getRootContextNode()
Gets the root context node of this graph.

Returns:
The graph's root context node.

close

void close()
Closes the graph. This should be called when work on the graph is done.

clear

void clear()
Clears all data from the graph. This is equivalent to calling getRootContextNode().clear();

isEmpty

boolean isEmpty()
Checks if the graph is empty. This is equivalent to calling getRootContextNode().isEmpty();

findContextNode

ContextNode findContextNode(XRI3Segment xri,
                            boolean create)
Finds a context node at any depth in this graph.

Parameters:
xri - The XRI of the context node.
create - Whether or not to create context nodes if they don't exist.
Returns:
A context node or null

findRelation

Relation findRelation(XRI3Segment xri,
                      XRI3Segment arcXri)
Finds a relation at any depth in this graph.

Parameters:
xri - The XRI of the context node containing the relation.
arcXri - The arc XRI of the relation.
Returns:
A relation or null.

findRelations

ReadOnlyIterator<Relation> findRelations(XRI3Segment xri,
                                         XRI3Segment arcXri)
Finds relations at any depth in this graph.

Parameters:
xri - The XRI of the context node containing the relations.
arcXri - The arc XRI of the relations.
Returns:
An iterator over relations.

findLiteral

Literal findLiteral(XRI3Segment xri)
Finds a literal at any depth in this graph.

Parameters:
xri - The XRI of the context node containing the literal.
Returns:
A literal or null.

containsContextNode

boolean containsContextNode(XRI3Segment xri)
Checks if a context node exists in this graph.

Parameters:
xri - The XRI of the context node.
Returns:
True, if the context node exists.

containsRelations

boolean containsRelations(XRI3Segment xri,
                          XRI3Segment arcXri)
Checks if relations exists in this graph.

Parameters:
xri - The XRI of the context node containing the relation.
arcXri - The arc XRI of the relation.
Returns:
True, if the relation exists.

containsLiteral

boolean containsLiteral(XRI3Segment xri)
Checks if a literal exists in this graph.

Parameters:
xri - The XRI of the context node containing the literal.
Returns:
True, if the literal exists.
